experienceList.title: Associate Software Engineer
highlights: -Designed and Implemented Transaction Flow for Authentication of Rupay Cards.
-Dedicated to enhancing the success rate of e-commerce transactions on a daily basis, and to date, have contributed to an 8% improvement in success rates for clients.
-Engineered APIs to streamline data exchange between banks and the Access Control Server (ACS).
-Integrated ACS with bank switch APIs, enabling seamless customer data retrieval during transactions.
-Implemented Card Block Functionality for banks, enabling card blocking at the ACS after multiple incorrect OTP entries.
-Designed and Implemented ATM PIN Based Authentication Flow for Card Not Present (CNP) Transactions.

experienceList.title: Web Application Developer Intern
highlights: -Designed and Developed Jeopardy Capture The Flag (CTF).
-Integrated all ten OWASP vulnerabilities in a web application.
